armor.name: Chainmail
armor.effect: Bane on EVADE and SNEAKING rolls.

armor.name: Plate Armor
armor.effect: Bane on ACROBATICS, EVADE, and SNEAKING rolls.

helmets.name: Great Helm
helmets.effect: Bane on AWARENESS and all ranged attacks.

musical_instruments.name: Bagpipe
musical_instruments.effect: Reduces the WP cost of the Musician ability to 1 and increases range to 50 meters.

musical_instruments.name: Drum
musical_instruments.effect: Increases the range of the Musician ability to 20 meters.

trade_goods.name: Abacus
trade_goods.effect: Boon on INT rolls for solving mathematical problems.

trade_goods.name: Blanket
trade_goods.effect: Required to avoid a bane on rolls to avoid the effects of cold.

studies_and_magic.name: Amulet
studies_and_magic.effect: Can be used as a focus for spells.

studies_and_magic.name: Book
studies_and_magic.effect: Boon on skill rolls in a specific subject. Cost varies depending on the subject.

light_sources.name: Flint & Tinder
light_sources.effect: Required to light torches, candles, or lanterns, and to make a fire.

light_sources.name: Lamp Oil
light_sources.effect: Holds ten doses. Each dose keeps an oil lamp or lantern burning for up to one shift of time.

tools.name: Crowbar
tools.effect: Deals 2D6 damage against a door or wall without risk of being damaged. Hits automatically.

tools.name: Hammer
tools.effect: Deals 2D4 damage against a door or wall without risk of being damaged. Hits automatically.

containers.name: Backpack
containers.effect: Increases carrying capacity by 2. A person can only use one backpack at a time.

containers.name: Barrel
containers.effect: Holds up to 15 weight units. Can take 10 points of damage, armor rating 3.

medicine.name: Bandages (10)
medicine.effect: Required to avoid a bane on HEALING rolls for saving lives. Each attempt consumes one bandage.

medicine.name: Surgical Instruments
medicine.effect: Boon on HEALING rolls for saving a life.

services.name: Bath at an Inn
services.effect: Heals a condition of your choice in one stretch. Only one bath per day has this effect.

services.name: Bodyguard
services.effect: Provides protection. Stats as a typical guard on page 105.

hunting_and_fishing.name: Bear Trap
hunting_and_fishing.effect: When triggered, deals D8 damage and immobilizes the target until they succeed on an EVADE roll. Can be used once per setup.

hunting_and_fishing.name: Fishing Net
hunting_and_fishing.effect: Boon on HUNTING & FISHING rolls to catch fish. Can hold up to 20 fish before becoming ineffective.

means_of_travel.name: Donkey
means_of_travel.effect: Can carry up to 100 kg. Slower than a horse but steady and resilient over rough terrain.

means_of_travel.name: Horse, Riding
means_of_travel.effect: Can carry up to 80 kg. Used primarily for personal transportation.

animals.name: Cat
animals.effect: Known for agility and stealth, provides a boon on AWARENESS rolls to detect vermin or small creatures.

animals.name: Dog
animals.effect: Loyal companion that provides a boon on tracking and guarding duties. Often trained to assist in hunts.
